title: Physical fitness and good health
creator_credit: Les Clark, Ken Peterson and Walt Disney Productions
brief_description: Uses animation to hows how exercise helps build muscle tissue and increase the capillaries’ capacity to supply blood to body parts; presents live action sequences of animals to show that rest is essential to all forms of animal life; discusses the importance of a proper diet for physical fitness and good health.
